paintpanel

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintpanel.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon

    public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
    A class to be used together with PaintPanel_GU2. A Text object displays a text in a PaintPanel_GU2 window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Text(java.lang.String text)
      Creates an object that displays text argument
      Text(java.lang.String text, java.awt.Font font)
      Creates an object that displays the argument text with a given font
      Text(java.lang.String text, java.awt.Font font, java.awt.Color foreground)
      Creates an object that displays the argument text with a given font and color (foreground)
      Text(java.lang.String text, java.awt.Font font, java.awt.Color foreground, java.awt.Color background)
      Creates an object that displays the argument text with a given font and color on a colored background
